div.h5: Mamaroneck School District's mission is to promote intellectual engagement and an appreciation of learning as an inherently rewarding activity and to prepare students to function as responsible citizens in a multicultural world.

Average number of books in classroom libraries.

div.p: Hours dedicated to the study of Computer Science in 3rd- 5th grade.

It is the mission of the Mamaroneck Union Free School District to promote intellectual engagement and an appreciation of learning as an inherently rewarding activity and to prepare students to function as responsible citizens in a multicultural world.

article.h2: Gov. Cuomo Extends School Closure to May 15

div.p: Please note that there are no transportation services during school closure. To see the latest District communications on the school closure, please follow the link below:
Elementary parents, please click the link below for remote learning information and resources during this closure:
